properties.query:
let AWSLogon=(){
AWSCloudTrail
 | where EventName == 'ConsoleLogin'
 | extend
  EventVendor = 'AWS'
  , EventProduct='AWSCloudTrail'
  , EventCount=1
  , EventSchemaVersion='0.1.0'
  , EventResult= iff (ResponseElements has_cs 'Success', 'Success', 'Failure')
  // , EventResultDetais
  , EventStartTime=TimeGenerated
  , EventEndTime=TimeGenerated
  , EventType='Logon'
  , AuthMethod=iff(AdditionalEventData has '"MFAUsed": "No"', 'NoMFA', 'MFA')
  , TargetAppName =tostring(todynamic(AdditionalEventData).LoginTo)
  , TargetUsernameType='Simple'
  , TargetUserIdType='AWSId'
  | project-rename
    EventOriginalUid= AwsEventId
  , EventOriginalResultDetails= ErrorMessage
  , TargetUsername= UserIdentityUserName
  , TargetUserType=UserIdentityType
  , TargetUserId=UserIdentityAccountId 
  , SrcIpAddr=SourceIpAddress
  , HttpUserAgent=UserAgent,
// **** Aliases
| extend
      UserId=TargetUserId
      , User=TargetUsername
      , AuthTarget=CloudAppName
      , Dvc=EventVendor
  };
  AWSLogon
